tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE brand_influencer_sentiment (
    brand_id INT,
    influencer_id INT,
    comment TEXT,
    sentiment ANALYZED,
    reputation ANALYZED
);

CREATE TABLE brand_tracking (
    brand_id UUID,
    influencer_id UUID,
    tracking_date DATE,
    tracking_result TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (brand_id, influencer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    brand_id UUID NOT NULL,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    sentiment_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    brand_id UUID NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL
);
